Text: i tried this with p2p release and the game started fine, but couldn't load any of my saves because the game couldn't find one of the required dlc files...

"I have no idea if these will work with a P2P or some other release..."

Let me stop you right there. You don't KNOW if this will work and you are uploading it when there is already a plethora of confirmed scene cracks that work for every release on this very website?

Balls to the metal fail right there sir.

I did a fresh install using the Shitrow .iso and then applied this. It gave me an error about patch1.000 missing. So I downloaded the 1.2.630-P2P crack and just dragged and dropped patch1.000 to the install dir and it works perfectly.

Thanks for uploading.

Illanair@ I did it because Dude asked if someone could. Besides, there's no other scene release crack. They may work but they are not scene release. Also, this seem to update the game to 1.2. The otheres are either 1.0 or 1.1.
